resources.string: %1$s edge of the status bar pulls down Quick Settings
Always show Quick Settings on status bar pulldown
Makes it so one click will turn WiFi on or off instead of taking you to settings
Enable one tap action to enable or disable data
Double-tap on the status bar or top third and bottom shortcut area of the lock screen to turn off the display
Enable various network traffic options in statusbar
Hide the traffic monitor when there is no activity
Hide the traffic monitor activity arrows
Adjust brightness by sliding across the status bar
Lights in Do Not Disturb mode
Automatically set a proper color for the led notification if the app has no custom values
To add per app control, activate \'%1$s\' and press \'\u002b\' on the menu bar
View or change lock screen shortcuts
Press on color below to apply
Must be in DateFormat eg. MM/dd/yy
Place the navigation bar on the left side of the screen in landscape mode
Unable to load image from content provider
Back and Home are required to be set at all times. To change a Back or Home assignment, set the desired assignment first
When only a right or left action is assigned, the action applies to the full bar
Fine tune long swipe thresholds based on a percentage of Fling interface width or height
Show a trail on swipe gestures
Increase or decrease the time it takes to execute a long press
Pulse is a brilliant audio graphic equalizer on the navigation bar when music plays. Pulse does not work with some audio sources when listening on device speaker
Audio graphic equalizer on the navigation bar
Pulse animates a smooth lava lamp style color blend
Medium press and drag to change position. Long press to show edit menu. Button position may be changed while menu is showing.
Set the position of contextual buttons such as menu and ime selector
Set the animation style of the primary buttons when they are pressed
Are you sure you want to reset Smartbar to stock settings?
Set what buttons to show when a on-screen keyboard is showing
Double tap on navbar empty areas to switch off the screen
Longpress power button with screen off turns on torch
Disable quick settings on lock screen
Disables quick settings on secure lockscreen
To allow applications to display interactive notifications in a pop-up window on your screen, enable Heads up.
Swiping up on peeking notifications will snooze heads up from that application for 1 minute
Swiping up on peeking notifications will snooze heads up from that application for %d minutes
Bug reporting is disabled in development settings
Configure what icons are shown on status bar
Enable to show Bliss logo on the left side of statusbar
Choose which side to display the logo on, left or right
Please enter a new label. Leave blank to revert to stock label.
Enable the old status bar ticker
Change the default font of the lockscreen clock widget
Close the color picker without applying the new color, (cancel).\nThis has the same effect as clicking the back button on the navigation bar.
Only shows the title, no additional functions
The color preview is always visible.\nIf the new color doesn\'t equals the old color, the color preview will be expanded, to allow apply the new color.

Shows the hex input field.
Hex values have to be in hex color format:
'#aarrggbb', ('alpha' (transparency), 'red', 'green' and 'blue').
The back button closes the hex input field without setting the hex value.
The apply button sets the hex value as new color without applying the new color.
Resets the new color to the default Android, Bliss or theme related color without applying the new color.
Shows/hides the favorites.\nHiding the favorites will not reset the favorite colors.
Pick a color to set a new color without applying the new color.\nThe color range can be changed using the slider on the right side

Favorites are empty by default.\nThe new color can be saved as a favorite at any time via long click, (a none empty favorite will be overwritten by the new color).\nA click sets the favorite color as new color, without applying the new color.
All palette colors have a fixed value.\nA click sets the palette color as new color, without applying the new color.
Blur the StatusBar background when pulled down
Set the background of notifications translucent
Blur the background of RecentApps View
Blur personalizations are disabled during Keyguard view!

These colors are the ones tiniting the BlurBackground. Instead of the normal Grey, you can now choose the colors in the way you like. \n There are three color filters: One used for light backgrounds, one used for Dark backgrounds and one used for light/dark backgrounds. \n
Blur personlizations are disabled during Keyguard view! Only Translucent Notifications are enabled!
Enable/Disable action for the task manager button in the expanded statusbar area
Enable/disable button in task manager to clear notifications
Enable/disable button to access running services in task manager
Scrolling cache may improve scrolling performance at the cost of memory
Allow to set the same icon style chosen for the statusbar battery
Set the color of the statusbar battery icon while charging
Show the battery percentage outside the icon while charging
Show the battery percentage inside the icon while charging
Show a symbol near percentage text outside the battery icon when charging
Blend full/empty colors corresponding to battery percentage
Full → empty: red ← green ← blue ← red
Full → empty: red → green → blue → red
Enable disable ram bar in recent app view
